titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: General Social Care Council (Retired) - Description

p.b: This item has been retired from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.

div.p: From 1 August 2012 the regulation of the social work profession and education transferred to the Health and Care Professions Council .

p.b: The last live version of this item is available in the June 2012 release of the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.
Access to this version can be obtained by emailing information.standards@nhs.net with "NHS Data Model and Dictionary - Archive Request" in the email subject line.
